```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = F, warning = F)
```

Read in data
```{r}
fire_seasonality <- read_csv("data_raw/viz_critique/fire-seasonality.csv")

fire_seasonality[fire_seasonality == 0] = NA

?is.na

fire_seasonality %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Number_Studies)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = Mechanism,
             x = Number_Studies,
             fill = Climate)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 0:12) +
  ggtitle("Evidence of Fire Seasonality Effects \n on Plant Population Persistence")
```
